pages.text: $(li)Strawberry Pips can be plant in farmland to generate $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/neapolitan/strawberries)Strawberries$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/neapolitan/white_strawberries)White Strawberries$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can use Strawberry Pips to craft a $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/seed_pouch)Seed Pouch$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l) too.
$(li)Finally you can put Strawberry Pips in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/composter)Composter$(/l) to generate $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone_meal)Bone Meal$(/l).
